about_the_game:
For many years, hunters were troubled by the Cloners' powerful abilities, especially their talent for camouflage and mimicking any object. However, everything changed when someone set out to stop them once and for all. This marked the beginning of the Hunters' pursuit of the Cloners

GamePlay

Cloner is a 2D online multiplayer game , two teams: the Hunters and the Cloners. The Cloner has the ability to clone any object on the map and blend into it, while the Hunters must find and capture the Cloner before time runs out.


Hunters Team:
The Hunter team has several unique abilities and powers that the Cloners do not, and vice versa. One of the Hunters' key abilities is tracking and capturing the Cloners, and they also have effects that help reveal the hidden locations of the Cloners

Cloners Team:
On the other hand, the Cloners can hide and mimic the appearance of any object on the map. They also have powerful effects that help them survive against the Hunters.


The Hunters must find the Cloners, who will have taken the form of objects like trees, chairs, and more, and capture them. Both teams have special effects to help them. If time runs out and the Hunters haven't found all the Cloners, the Cloners win.

name: Cloners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4790K
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
